job.title: GCP Data Engineer
job.description: Hi Professionals..,  I am looking to hire # GCP Data Engineer #position.  Please find the below Job Description and share me the feedback if you are interested. Client:Macys  Implementation:Infosys Job Title:GCP Data Engineer  Work Location: Atlanta, GA  Duraton:06 Months GCP Candidate must be located within commuting distance of Atlanta, GA or be willing to relocate to the area.  7 years of experience with Information Technology and Data engineering.  3 years of experience in Big Data on Big Data, Python, Scala, Spark Big Data, Scala and spark
